    • Method Detail

      • placeBet

        public boolean placeBet(long amountInCents)
                 throws NoPlayerCardException,
                        BetNotExceptedException
        try to place bet with given amount and connected card. amount needs to be checked with the cashier if accepted: generate a bet using the card and add it to the game.
        Specified by:
        placeBet in interface IGamingMachine
        Parameters:
        amountInCents - amount in cents to gamble
        Returns:
        true if bet is valid, excepted and added to betting round.
        Throws:
        NoPlayerCardException - when no card is connected to this machine.
        BetNotExceptedException

      • acceptWinner

        public void acceptWinner(BetResult winResult)
                  throws InvalidAmountException
        Accept the BetResult from the winner. Clear all open bets on this machine. When the winner has made his bet on this machine: let the Cashier update the amount of the winner.
        Specified by:
        acceptWinner in interface IGamingMachine
        Parameters:
        winResult - result of a betting round. can be null when there is no winner.
        Throws:
        InvalidAmountException

        gamingmachineID

      • disconnectCard

        public void disconnectCard()
                    throws CurrentBetMadeException
        disconnects/removes card from this gaming machine.
        Specified by:
        disconnectCard in interface IGamingMachine
        Throws:
        CurrentBetMadeException - when open bets made with this card are still present in the current betting round and
